metadata.name: Express Yourself 1/69
metadata.description: The 'smallforest project' is based in PDX.  It began publishing about physical tokens in 2006, and creating physicals in 2008.  To date thousands of self-published physicals have been issued in various metallic compositions including gold, silver, copper, bronze, and nickel, in addition to thousands more 'smallforest' counter-marked coins, medals and so-called dollars issued by other parties. Its first non-physical token (NPT) is an ERC 1155 token issued in 2021. Another project, 'PDXpoles', is a series of NPT on the polygon network published in 2022. The 'Express Yourself' NPT on zora is an extension of the project whose ultimate goal is to tie NPT to physical tokens, perhaps mediated by a fully fungible token (FFT) issued on one of the EVM chains.  The premise of the smallforest project is based on a single rhetorical question: What if entropy is not inevitable?
